"The Golden Rule" - Everyone must treat others as they would like to be treated. This rule promotes empathy, compassion, and respect, which are essential for building a harmonious and inclusive society.
"The Three Rs" - Everyone must reduce, reuse, and recycle to protect the environment and preserve natural resources for future generations.
"The One Child Policy" - Everyone must have only one child to control population growth and reduce the strain on resources and infrastructure.
"The Equal Opportunity Policy" - Everyone must have equal access to education, healthcare, and job opportunities regardless of their background, gender, race, or religion.
"The No Violence Policy" - Everyone must refrain from using violence to resolve conflicts or achieve their goals, promoting peace and stability in the world.
